metadata.title: CVE-2023-27986 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
emacsclient-mail.desktop in Emacs 28.1 through 28.2 is vulnerable to EmacsLisp code injections through a crafted mailto: URI with unescapeddouble-quote characters. It is fixed in 29.0.90.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27986` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-bin-common - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-common - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-el - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-gtk - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-lucid - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-nox - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-pgtk - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: emacs package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '29.3+1-1ubuntu2').
xemacs21 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
